rukus.text: shr whlak likuli mghtab llnas, tean fyhm
aldhy kan hmmuh jame almal wtedadh
yzn 'anah damin linafsih bhdha almal aldhy jmeh, alkhulud fi aldunya wal'iflat min alhsab
lys al'amr kama zn, lyutrhnn fi alnaar alati thshm kl ma yulqa fyha
'inha nar allah almuqadat alty min shdtha tnfudh min al'ajsam 'iilaa alqlwb
'inha nar allah almuqadat alty min shdtha tnfudh min al'ajsam 'iilaa alqlwb
'iinaha ealayhim mtbaqt fi salasil waghlal mtwwalt; lialaa yakhrujuu mnha
